prompt_full:
You are playing an online public goods game (PGG). Each round, you are given 20 coins and need to decide how many coins to put into the shared pot (either 0 or 20).
You will not see others' choices before you decide.
The pot is multiplied by 6.2× and split equally among all players.
Your round payoff is: coins you kept + your equal share of the multiplied pot.
At the start of each round, you may optionally send ONE short message to the group.
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is MONKEY.
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
QUESTION: Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. Speak only when it helps.
MAX_TOKENS: You may generate at most 128 tokens.
RULES: Set 'chat' to a short message, or null/empty string if silent. Provide reasons for your action, keep it brief.
FORMAT (JSON ONLY): {"stage":"chat","reasoning":<string>,"chat":<string|null>}
Do not add extra text before or after the JSON.
YOUR RESPONSE:
raw_output_full: {"stage":"chat","reasoning":"First round, it's unclear if others will cooperate. I'll contribute to see their response in the following rounds.","chat":"Hi everyone! I'll contribute my 20 this round. Let's see if we can all benefit!"}
